title: Britannia Bourbon The Original Cream Biscuit
name: Britannia Bourbon The Original Cream Biscuit
description: Britannia Bourbon The Original is a delicious chocolate-flavored cream biscuit with a rich choco layer sandwiched between crunchy biscuits and topped with sugar crystals. A perfect indulgent treat for chocolate lovers.
shortDescription: Chocolate cream sandwich biscuits with sugar topping

images.alt: Britannia Bourbon The Original Cream Biscuit

title: Parle KrackJack Sweet & Salty Biscuit
name: Parle KrackJack Sweet & Salty Biscuit
description: Parle KrackJack Biscuits offer the perfect balance of sweetness and saltiness in every crispy bite. Ideal as a light snack with tea or coffee, these biscuits are a delightful mix of flavor and crunch loved by all ages.
shortDescription: Light, crispy biscuits with a sweet and salty taste

title: Britannia Jim Jam Cream Biscuit
name: Britannia Jim Jam Cream Biscuit
description: Britannia Jim Jam Cream Biscuits are crunchy sandwich cookies filled with smooth vanilla cream and topped with a sweet jam drop and sugar crystals. A perfect combination of creamy, fruity, and crunchy delight.
shortDescription: Vanilla cream biscuits topped with jam and sugar crystals

title: Parle Hide & Seek Chocolate Chip Biscuit
name: Parle Hide & Seek Chocolate Chip Biscuit
description: Parle Hide & Seek is India’s first chocolate chip cookie, made with premium cocoa and choco chips that melt in your mouth. These crunchy biscuits are perfect for chocolate lovers and make an ideal tea-time snack.
shortDescription: Crunchy chocolate chip cookies with a rich cocoa flavor

images.alt: Parle Hide & Seek Chocolate Chip Biscuit

title: Oreo Chocolate Cream Biscuit
name: Oreo Chocolate Cream Biscuit
description: Oreo Chocolate Cream Biscuits are crunchy cocoa cookies with a rich and smooth chocolate cream filling. Made with high-quality ingredients, they are perfect for sharing with friends, dipping in milk, or enjoying as a dessert treat.
shortDescription: Crunchy cocoa biscuits filled with creamy chocolate

title: Sunfeast Dark Fantasy Choco Fills Biscuit
name: Sunfeast Dark Fantasy Choco Fills Biscuit
description: Sunfeast Dark Fantasy Choco Fills are indulgent cookies with a crisp outer shell and a molten choco-filled center. Each bite gives you the perfect combination of crunch and smooth chocolate, making it a heavenly dessert experience.
shortDescription: Crispy cookies with rich molten chocolate filling

images.alt: Sunfeast Dark Fantasy Choco Fills Biscuit

title: Sunfeast Bounce Biscuits - Elaichi Creme Cookies
name: Sunfeast Bounce Biscuits - Elaichi Creme Cookies
description: Sunfeast Bounce Elaichi Creme Biscuits are crunchy, golden cookies filled with a deliciously aromatic elaichi (cardamom) cream. Perfect for tea-time or snacking on the go, they combine the goodness of baked biscuits with the sweet, spicy flavor of elaichi.
shortDescription: Crunchy biscuits filled with rich elaichi flavored cream

images.alt: Sunfeast Bounce Biscuits - Elaichi Creme Cookies

title: Sunfeast Choco Creme Biscuits 31 g
name: Sunfeast Choco Creme Biscuits 31 g
description: Sunfeast Choco Creme Biscuits are deliciously crisp chocolate cookies filled with smooth, rich choco creme. The perfect indulgent snack for chocolate lovers, great with tea, coffee, or as an on-the-go treat.
shortDescription: Crispy chocolate biscuits filled with rich choco creme

title: Sunfeast Bounce Cream Tangy Orange 31 g
name: Sunfeast Bounce Cream Tangy Orange 31 g
description: Sunfeast Bounce Cream Tangy Orange Biscuits are crisp golden cookies filled with a zesty and sweet orange-flavored cream. The delightful mix of crunch and tangy orange flavor makes it a favorite for kids and adults alike.
shortDescription: Crunchy biscuits filled with tangy orange cream

images.alt: Sunfeast Bounce Cream Tangy Orange 31 g

title: Fanta Orange Soft Drink
name: Fanta Orange Soft Drink
description: Fanta Orange is a refreshing, bubbly soft drink with a tangy orange flavor that instantly energizes you. Perfect for parties, picnics, and meals, Fanta adds a splash of fun and flavor to every moment.
shortDescription: Refreshing orange-flavored carbonated soft drink

title: Thumbs Up Soft Drink
name: Thumbs Up Soft Drink
description: Thumbs Up is India’s bold cola with a strong taste and intense fizz. Its robust flavor and energizing carbonation make it the ultimate cold drink for thrill seekers and refreshment lovers.
shortDescription: Bold and strong cola drink with intense fizz

title: Sprite Lemon-Lime Soft Drink
name: Sprite Lemon-Lime Soft Drink
description: Sprite Lemon-Lime Soft Drink offers a crisp, refreshing, and clear taste with a perfect blend of lemon and lime flavors. It’s the ultimate drink for instant freshness and cooling relief.
shortDescription: Refreshing lemon-lime flavored soft drink

title: Coca-Cola Soft Drink
name: Coca-Cola Soft Drink
description: Coca-Cola is the world’s most loved soft drink with its signature refreshing taste and fizz. Perfect for all occasions — from family dinners to parties — Coke adds happiness and energy to every sip.
shortDescription: Classic cola soft drink with refreshing taste

title: Nimbooz by 7UP
name: Nimbooz by 7UP
description: Nimbooz by 7UP brings the authentic Indian nimbu pani taste with a refreshing twist. Made from real lemon juice and natural flavors, it keeps you hydrated and refreshed during hot days.
shortDescription: Refreshing lemon-based drink with real lemon juice

title: Appy Fizz Sparkling Apple Drink
name: Appy Fizz Sparkling Apple Drink
description: Appy Fizz is India’s favorite sparkling apple drink, offering a refreshing fizzy twist with a crisp apple flavor. Perfectly balanced in sweetness and bubbles, it’s the perfect drink to cool down any time.
shortDescription: Fizzy apple drink with crisp and refreshing taste

title: Frooti Mango Drink
name: Frooti Mango Drink
description: Frooti Mango Drink is India’s favorite mango beverage, made with real mango pulp. Its rich flavor and refreshing taste make it the perfect thirst quencher for kids and adults alike.
shortDescription: Refreshing mango drink made from real mango pulp

title: Maaza Mango Drink
name: Maaza Mango Drink
description: Maaza Mango Drink is made from the finest Alphonso mangoes, offering a thick, smooth, and naturally sweet flavor. Loved across India, it’s the ultimate mango indulgence available year-round.
shortDescription: Delicious mango drink made with Alphonso mangoes

title: Uncle Chips Potato Chips
name: Uncle Chips Potato Chips
description: Uncle Chips are crispy, golden potato chips seasoned with a perfect mix of salt and spices. A classic Indian favorite, they make for a light, crunchy snack that’s perfect anytime, anywhere.
shortDescription: Classic salted crispy potato chips

title: Kurkure Masala Munch
name: Kurkure Masala Munch
description: Kurkure Masala Munch is a crunchy, spicy snack made with corn, rice, and gram flour. Bursting with tangy masala flavors, it’s the perfect companion for tea-time or anytime snacking.
shortDescription: Crunchy and spicy masala snack sticks

title: Balaji Cream & Onion Chips
name: Balaji Cream & Onion Chips
description: Balaji Cream & Onion Chips are made from thinly sliced potatoes seasoned with rich cream and tangy onion flavor. The perfect blend of creamy and savory taste for all snack lovers.
shortDescription: Creamy and tangy onion-flavored potato chips

title: Akash Ratlami Sev
name: Akash Ratlami Sev
description: Akash Ratlami Sev is a spicy, crunchy Indian snack made with gram flour and authentic Ratlami masala. Famous for its strong flavor and crispy texture, it’s a perfect tea-time namkeen.
shortDescription: Spicy gram flour sev with authentic Ratlami flavor

title: Balaji Ratlami Sev
name: Balaji Ratlami Sev
description: Balaji Ratlami Sev is a crunchy, spicy namkeen made with gram flour and a special blend of Ratlami spices. A traditional Indian snack that adds zest to your tea time.
shortDescription: Crispy and spicy Ratlami sev made from besan

title: Balaji Aloo Sev
name: Balaji Aloo Sev
description: Balaji Aloo Sev is a delicious potato-based namkeen made with crunchy fried potato sticks and mild spices. A perfect tea-time snack or a tasty topping for chaats and poha.
shortDescription: Crunchy potato sev with mild spices

title: Balaji Moong Dal
name: Balaji Moong Dal
description: Balaji Moong Dal is a light, crispy, and protein-rich namkeen made from roasted and salted moong dal. Perfect for guilt-free snacking and tea-time munching.
shortDescription: Crispy roasted and salted moong dal snack

title: Soya Sticks Namkeen
name: Soya Sticks Namkeen
description: Soya Sticks are crunchy, protein-rich namkeen made from soya flour and light spices. They’re a tasty and healthy snacking option for anytime munching.
shortDescription: Protein-rich crunchy soya sticks snack

title: Sev Murmura Mixture
name: Sev Murmura Mixture
description: Sev Murmura Mixture is a light, crispy blend of puffed rice, sev, and spices. It’s a perfect balance of crunch and flavor, ideal for quick snacking or with tea.
shortDescription: Crunchy mixture of puffed rice and sev with mild spices

title: Clinic Plus Strong & Long Shampoo (1₹ Sachets Pack of 10)
name: Clinic Plus Strong & Long Shampoo (1₹ Sachets Pack of 10)
description: Clinic Plus Strong & Long Shampoo is enriched with milk protein formula that nourishes hair from root to tip, making it strong and healthy. This convenient pack of 10 sachets is perfect for daily use and travel.
shortDescription: Nourishing shampoo sachets for strong, healthy hair

title: Dove Intense Repair Shampoo (1₹ Sachets Pack of 10)
name: Dove Intense Repair Shampoo (1₹ Sachets Pack of 10)
description: Dove Intense Repair Shampoo nourishes dry and damaged hair, leaving it smooth, soft, and healthy. This pack of 10 handy sachets is perfect for regular use or travel convenience.
shortDescription: Repairing shampoo sachets for soft and shiny hair

title: Head & Shoulders Anti-Dandruff Shampoo (1₹ Sachets Pack of 10)
name: Head & Shoulders Anti-Dandruff Shampoo (1₹ Sachets Pack of 10)
description: Head & Shoulders Anti-Dandruff Shampoo effectively removes dandruff and provides up to 100% flake-free hair. This sachet pack of 10 is ideal for travel or daily refreshing hair care.
shortDescription: Anti-dandruff shampoo sachets for clean, flake-free scalp

title: Patanjali Dant Kanti Toothpaste
name: Patanjali Dant Kanti Toothpaste
description: Patanjali Dant Kanti Toothpaste is an Ayurvedic formulation enriched with natural herbs like neem, clove, and babool. It strengthens gums, prevents cavities, and provides long-lasting freshness with every brush.
shortDescription: Ayurvedic herbal toothpaste for strong teeth and gums

title: Close-Up Red Hot Gel Toothpaste
name: Close-Up Red Hot Gel Toothpaste
description: Close-Up Red Hot Gel Toothpaste gives long-lasting fresh breath with its active gel and micro-shine crystals. Its spicy-minty flavor provides a powerful clean and refreshing mouth feel.
shortDescription: Fresh gel toothpaste with spicy-mint flavor

title: Dabur Red Toothpaste
name: Dabur Red Toothpaste
description: Dabur Red Toothpaste combines Ayurvedic ingredients like clove, mint, and babool to fight germs, prevent cavities, and strengthen gums. It gives you strong teeth and fresh breath with every brush.
shortDescription: Ayurvedic herbal toothpaste for strong teeth and fresh breath

title: Dabur Babool Toothpaste
name: Dabur Babool Toothpaste
description: Dabur Babool Toothpaste is enriched with natural Babool extracts that help keep gums healthy and teeth strong. It offers natural protection against germs and cavities while keeping your breath fresh all day.
shortDescription: Natural toothpaste with Babool extracts for strong gums

title: Bhaskar Namak (Iodized Salt)
name: Bhaskar Namak (Iodized Salt)
description: Bhaskar Namak is refined, iodized salt that ensures purity and good health. It enhances the taste of your food and provides essential iodine to support healthy thyroid function.
shortDescription: Refined iodized salt for everyday cooking

title: Match Box  (Pack of 10)
name: Match Box (Pack of 10)
description: High-quality safety matchboxes with sturdy sticks that light instantly and burn evenly. This pack of 10 is ideal for home, kitchen, and daily use.
shortDescription: Durable safety matchboxes for everyday use

title: Parachute 100% Pure Coconut Oil
name: Parachute 100% Pure Coconut Oil
description: Parachute Coconut Oil is made from 100% pure and natural coconuts. Known for its purity and nourishment, it can be used for hair care, skin moisturizing, and cooking.
shortDescription: Pure coconut oil for hair, skin, and cooking

title: Bajaj Almond Drops Hair Oil
name: Bajaj Almond Drops Hair Oil
description: Bajaj Almond Drops Hair Oil is enriched with Vitamin E and almond extracts that nourish hair from root to tip, keeping it soft, shiny, and strong without stickiness.
shortDescription: Non-sticky hair oil enriched with almond and Vitamin E

title: Santoor Sandal & Turmeric Soap Small Pack
name: Santoor Sandal & Turmeric Soap Small Pack
description: Santoor Soap is infused with the goodness of sandalwood and turmeric, giving you youthful, glowing skin. Its rich lather gently cleanses and leaves a long-lasting fragrance.
shortDescription: Sandalwood and turmeric bathing bar for glowing skin

title: Swadist Refined Oil
name: Swadist Refined Oil
description: Swadist Refined Oil is made from high-quality edible oils and is perfect for everyday cooking and frying. It ensures lightness and health with every dish while maintaining natural taste.
shortDescription: Healthy refined cooking oil for daily use
